properties.name: Council on International Educational Exchange - Classrooms
properties.description: Posted by NodoThis is where I took classes during the week that were taught by CIEE instructors. Other classes were offered by the University of Seville and were taught down the street at the University.

properties.name: Graham Complex / Alpha Residential Learning Community
properties.description: Posted by NodoWhat a gorgeous pool, huh? ....too bad it was an insurance liability and the university had it removed...those bastards. Well at least the beautiful SCU girls still lay out in the courtyard to catch the rays!

properties.name: Jameson Distillery
properties.description: Posted by Nodo dublin irelandThis is where I fell in love with Irish Whiskey and more specifically, Jameson. It is so smooth and velvety with a hint of vanilla, my mouth is watering right now. When you go on this tour (which is it worth every penny!) be sure to volunteer right at the beginning....trust me on this. It means you get to do all the tasting at the end of the tour...you will be drunk, drunk drunk! Be sure to find a good place to eat before and after, you\'ll need the substanence.

properties.name: Jamison Square Park
properties.description: Posted by Nodo

properties.name: Kobenhavns Lufthavn - AKA Copenhagen Airport
properties.description: Posted by Nodocopenhagen, denmarkDefinately had a layover here on my way to Madrid.

properties.name: My Sevillano Apartment!
properties.description: Posted by NodoThis was my home while I was living and studing in Seville. My host mother, Carmen, I owe a million thanks for how well she cared for me!

properties.name: National Palace in Sintra, Portugal
properties.description: Posted by NodoLisbon, PortugalThis is the National Palace of Portugal, owned by the royal family. Sintra is a beautiful city, make it your #1 stop in Portugal when you go. It has 3 or 4 castles that you can explore and a huge national park.

properties.name: Palácio da Pena - Sintra, Portugal .
properties.description: Posted by NodoPalácio da Pena, Sintra Portugal .Yet another bad-ass castle located in Sintra, Portugal, if you only go to one castle in this town, make sure it is this one!

properties.name: Parc Guell - Barcelona, Spain
properties.description: Posted by Nodobarcelona, spain

properties.name: Pioneer Courthouse Square
properties.description: Posted by Nodo97201Let\'s call this the jumping off point. This is my hometown, Portland, Oregon. I guess this is where my study abroad journey begins. Although I guess there are a few more stops before we get to Seville....

properties.name: Santa Clara University
properties.description: Posted by NodoSanta Clara Universitythis is an awesome school, I should know, I\'m a graduate of it. Keep an eye out for the Santa Clara University map I\'m creating. be sure to visit Pepperdine, it\'s beautiful, but be prepared to be overwhelmed by religiosity...but if that\'s your bag, so be it.

properties.name: University of Sevilla
properties.description: Posted by Nodoseville, spainThis photo is of the NE entrance of the university. The university is an old tobacco factory and is the setting for the opera Carmen...I highly recommend you see this opera..whether you like opera or not.

properties.name: Wilf's Restaurant and Bar
properties.description: Posted by Nodo THE best steak in Portland....period.
